@metadata.goal: The student can partition shapes into equal parts

steps.dialogue: Now show which parts were used if 3 pieces were served.

prompt.text: Shade the parts that were served

step.dialogue: Not quite. Shade exactly 3 pieces from the bar.

events.name: pulse_three_sections
events.description: Three consecutive sections of the bar pulse gently to indicate which pieces should be shaded

step.dialogue: [event:pulse_three_sections]You're getting there. Remember, 3 pieces were served, so you need to shade exactly 3 sections out of the 8 equal parts.

events.name: animated_sequential_shading
events.description: Animated demonstration showing three sections being shaded one at a time with counting overlay (1, 2, 3) and final annotation showing '3 out of 8 parts'

step.dialogue: [event:animated_sequential_shading]Let me help you with this one. If 3 pieces were served, we need to shade 3 sections. Watch as I shade 1, 2, 3 sections - that shows 3 out of 8 parts were used. See how 3 shaded sections out of 8 total shows the pieces that were served.

on_correct.dialogue: You shaded exactly 3 out of 8 parts.
